summary.span: 尝试读取缓冲区外的指定类型。

span.span: Attempts to read the specified type out of the buffer.

summary.span: 将此方法与任意结构一起使用不太安全 - 请参阅注释以获取详细信息。

span.span: It's dangerous to use this method with arbitrary structs - see remarks for more information.

returns.span: 如果读取尝试成功，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the read attempt was successful, otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > Read 是位的直接副本。The read is a straight copy of bits. 如果结构依赖于其成员的特定状态才能正常运行, 这可能会导致异常。If a struct depends on the specific state of its members to behave correctly, this can lead to exceptions. 如果要读取 endian 特定的整数, 请使用显式重载, 如[TryReadLittleEndian (SequenceReader\, Int32)](xref:System.Buffers.SequenceReaderExtensions.TryReadLittleEndian%2A)。If you're reading endian specific integers, use the explicit overloads such as [TryReadLittleEndian(SequenceReader\, Int32)](xref:System.Buffers.SequenceReaderExtensions.TryReadLittleEndian%2A).
